original_text: And one of the sons of Joiada, the son of Eliashib the high priest, was son in law to Sanballat the Horonite: therefore I chased him from me.
korean_text: 대제사장 엘리아십의 손자 요야다의 아들 하나가 호론 사람 산발랏의 사위가 되었으므로 내가 쫓아내어 나를 떠나게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: And one of the sons of Joiada
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 요야다의 아들 중 한 사람이

sentences.original_text: the son of Eliashib the high priest
was son in law to Sanballat the Horonite:
therefore I chased him from me.
